input.sentences: there were a ton of people that were about to show up for the event tonight .
soon the room was completely packed .
everyone was dancing and having a good time .
there were a lot of people chatting together .
the party lasted well into the evening .
output.sentences: The speaker used a projector to give a presentation on ants.
The audience was disinterested because ants are kind of boring.
After the presentation was over the audience let loose.
At the party, an old man flirted with a woman that was way to young for him.
A group of guys stood together and wished that they had better social skills.
